titleStmt.title: The mistaken bride: or, The faithful friend. To an excellent new tune, call'd Celia that I once was blest.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for J. Conyers, at the Black Raven near St. Andrews church, in Holborn.,

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication suggested by Wing.
Verse: "In fair London late did dwell ..."
Reproduction of original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the Black Raven near St. Andrews church, in Holborn.
